11.content:
Tails had no idea where Blaze's house was, but he figured he'd be able to find out soon. After all, he wasn't boasting an IQ of 300 for nothing. He walked along the street until he found a extravagant house with a purple door and two windows on each side. There stood Blaze's house.

Tails walked towards it and stepped in the front yard to peer through one of the windows. His eyes saw a big mansion-like structure in the centre of the house. With wonder and awe filling his eyes, he quickly rushed to the door only to find it closed and locked. Tails looked around for any sort of keyhole or something, but he couldn't see anything that would let him in.

"Well I guess this is it," he says to himself before pushing on the door. Much to his surprise, it swings open as if it wasn't locked at all.

"Huh, that was easy," he says as he closes the door behind him.

He found himself in a foyer of sorts. There was the main entrance and then a doorway on the other side that went to a stairway presumably leading to the second floor where he heard voices coming from.

"I was expecting you..."

Who was it?

I promise"Tails said and stopped walking to give her a chance to show herself. Cassia was afraid as she didnt know the Fox's true intent so she grabbed her tonfas and showed herself with a fighting stance. "Dont come any closer!"She said though her hands were shaking a bit. "Because i know of your fatal illness"Tails said which made her freeze. "H-how do you know a-about that?"She said surprised. Tails looks at her and took a step forward. "I found out about it recently and i suspect that Eggman said that he was going to help...right?"Tails said. Cassia was really confused now and she nods quickly. "Y-yeah...he said that he had a cure....to help me"Cassia said. "B-but im feeling better...i should be thankful"Cassia said. Tails saw the opening he had and breathed deeply. "But he didnt really help you Cassia. He only helped prolong your life"Tails said. Cassia let her guard down and lays her hands down. "W-what do you mean?"Cassia said. Tails slowly got close to her. "Cassia. Your illness...its not fully cured. I hacked into eggman's computer files...and it showed that while your cybernitized, it helped prolong your life...but that it wouldnt fully cure the illness. But even before doing this to you he knew and he did it anyway. I think he is using this as blackmail for you sister"he explained. Cassia looks at him. "What do you mean? Like he is forcing her to work with him?"Cassia said. She never trusted Eggman but this made her angry about him. To blackmail her sister with her own life...that was cruel. "Exactly. Luckily i have a more permanent solution to your situation."Tails said gently grabbing her hand. Cassia was confused. "Permanent? As in i can be officially cured?"Cassia said as Tail nods. "Yes...but i need you on board with this. And promise that you will agree on being on our side for my cause"Tails said. Cassia nods quickly. "I will do anything you want if you keep to your word!"Cassia said as he felt her hand squeeze his. "Or else"She said trying to be threatening. Tails nods. "Got it. Now lets go find your sister...i hope she didnt do something to my friend"Tails said as he got out of the alley with her and they both walked around looking for them and saw them.
